Package org.calypsonet.terminal.calypso.crypto.legacysam.transaction

Interface LSTransactionManagerFactory

  • public interface LSTransactionManagerFactory
    Factory of all SAM transaction managers.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LSAsyncTransactionCreatorManager createAsyncTransactionCreatorManager​(java.lang.String targetSamContext, LSSecuritySetting securitySetting)
      Creates an instance of LSAsyncTransactionCreatorManager.
      LSAsyncTransactionExecutorManager createAsyncTransactionExecutorManager​(org.calypsonet.terminal.reader.CardReader samReader, LegacySam sam, java.lang.String samCommands)

    • Method Detail

      • createFreeTransactionManager

        LSFreeTransactionManager createFreeTransactionManager​(org.calypsonet.terminal.reader.CardReader samReader,
                                                      LegacySam sam)
        Creates an instance of LSFreeTransactionManager.
        Parameters:
        samReader - The reader to use to communicate with the SAM.
        sam - The SAM image.
        Returns:
        A new instance of LSFreeTransactionManager.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If an argument is null.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • createAsyncTransactionCreatorManager

        LSAsyncTransactionCreatorManager createAsyncTransactionCreatorManager​(java.lang.String targetSamContext,
                                                                      LSSecuritySetting securitySetting)
        Creates an instance of LSAsyncTransactionCreatorManager.

        The target SAM context can be retrieved with the method LSFreeTransactionManager.exportTargetSamContextForAsyncTransaction().

        Parameters:
        targetSamContext - The target SAM context.
        securitySetting - The security settings.
        Returns:
        A new instance of LSAsyncTransactionCreatorManager.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If an argument is null.
        Since:
        0.2.0
        See Also:
        LSFreeTransactionManager.exportTargetSamContextForAsyncTransaction()

      • createAsyncTransactionExecutorManager

        LSAsyncTransactionExecutorManager createAsyncTransactionExecutorManager​(org.calypsonet.terminal.reader.CardReader samReader,
                                                                        LegacySam sam,
                                                                        java.lang.String samCommands)
        Creates an instance of LSAsyncTransactionExecutorManager.

        The SAM commands must be prepared using a LSAsyncTransactionCreatorManager.

        Parameters:
        samReader - The reader to use to communicate with the SAM.
        sam - The SAM image.
        samCommands - A string containing the prepared commands.
        Returns:
        A new instance of LSAsyncTransactionExecutorManager.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If an argument is null.
        Since:
        0.2.0
        See Also:
        LSAsyncTransactionCreatorManager
